name: NL Truck Games Simulator Cargo
description:
NL (North Logistics) Truck Simulator is a game that allows players to experience the thrill of driving a truck through the beautiful and diverse landscapes. With realistic graphics and immersive gameplay, this game puts players in the driver's seat as they navigate through various cities, countryside, and mountains. Players can choose from a variety of different trucks and customize them with different paint jobs and accessories. Whether you're a truck enthusiast or just looking for a fun and exciting driving game, North Logistics Truck Simulator is sure to provide hours of entertainment.

Terms and conditions: https://midnight.games/terms/
